name: All the Female Apprentices Want to Kill Me
author: 金古文化
content: Possessing the memories from the 21st century, I transmigrated inside a big shot, “Su Bei”, and brought my own “Apprenticeship Up to [10000] Times Feedback” system. The disciples are not only as beautiful as flowers, but they are also blessed with a revolutionary destiny. This is the chosen one who can become the main protagonist in any novel. But these disciples hate to be unable to peel my skin and tear my bones. What the hell did the past Su Bei do against these apprentices!!
